ARABIC: فَضَرَبْنَا عَلَىٰٓ ءَاذَانِهِمْ فِى ٱلْكَهْفِ سِنِينَ عَدَدًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: So We sealed their ears with sleep in the cave for a number of years.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We sealed off their ears in the cave for a number of years,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: We lulled them to sleep in that cave for a number of years
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We sealed their ears in the cave for a number of years.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: We then thumped upon their ears in the Cave for a number of years. (* Put them to sleep.)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Therefore, We covered up their hearing in Al-Kahf for a number of years.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So We prevented them from hearing in the cave for a number of years.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Then We smote their ears many years in the Cave.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then We sealed up their hearing in the Cave for a number of years.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Then We caused them to fall into a deep sleep for many years inside the cave.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Wherefore We put a covering over their ears in the cave for a number of years.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So We put them to sleep in the Cave for several years.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then We draw (a veil) over their ears, for a number of years, in the Cave, (so that they heard not):
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Therefore We covered up their (sense of) hearing (causing them, to go in deep sleep) in the Cave for a number of years.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: For many years We sealed up their hearing in the Cave,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Then We sealed their ears in the cave for a number of years.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So We cast [a cover of sleep] over their ears within the cave for a number of years.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [18:11] So We smote their ears, that is, We made them sleep, in the Cave for several years, for a [fixed] number of years.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then We sealed up their hearing) We cast sleep over them, such that they slept (in the Cave for a number of years) 309 years.
